\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 71413}

\subsection*{Slightly Sedated}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{HerbHugger}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 1 cup & oral & Chamomile & tea\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 140.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
About 30 minutes after drinking one cup of chamomile tea I feel slightly sedated, and slight reduction of anxiety. I imagine if you were to drink 3-4 cups of this you would feel even more sedated and less anxiety.
